snippet.title: The ONLINE Godzilla Game You NEVER Heard Of!
snippet.description:
Did you know that MYTHIC ENTERTAINMENT once made a Godzilla game, to coincide with the release of the 1998 Tristar movie? This little gem has fallen into obscurity throughout the years, but thanks to some ancient forum posts, we're able to recover what is known about it, and bring it to you.

Developed in collaboration with Dean Devlin, the movie's producer and co-writer, Godzilla Online is the ultimate showdown, featuring fast, thrilling, real-time action; 3D game environments, real opponents; team and head-to-head play; and persistent, compelling characters.

Join us as we talk about, the FORGOTTEN Godzilla movie tie in game.

DangerVille Store - https://teespring.com/en-GB/stores/shop-dangerville

Thumbnail Art - https://www.artstation.com/artwork/gJKGWE


ARTISTS - If you see your work featured in a video, please message us with details so we can accurately credit you.  Thank you. 

For more videos on GODZILLA, JURASSIC PARK & DINOSAURS, subscribe to us at DangerVille and become a Resident TODAY!

DV Twitter - https://twitter.com/DangervilleTeam
DV Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/dangervilleyoutube/
Alastair's Twitter - https://twitter.com/Alastair_Neill
Jacob's Twitter - https://twitter.com/STRIDAJACO

Theme Music Credit:
music by : soundcloud.com/jeff-kaale
Instagram : www.instagram.com/jeffkaale/
